item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Ah, Dodian servers are different I guess.
Try this:

if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { command = command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay"); command = command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay"); if(!muted) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); else sM("You are muted and cannot yell."); }

item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
{
    command = command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
    command = command.replaceAll("servegame", imgay");
    if(muted == 0)
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
    else
        sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell.");
}

Your friend is really lazy.

item.title: 2 things that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Change the [b]whole of;

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

To;

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Read full topic

client.java7673: illegal start of type } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ client.java7673: ';' expected } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ client.java7673: illegal start of type } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ client.java7673: ';' expected } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ client.java7673: invalid method declaration; return type required } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ client.java7673: illegal start of type } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ client.java7673: ';' expected } else if (command.startswith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { ^ 7 errors Press any key to continue.....

item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

try this prob wont work tho…

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

i also got this one

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == 0) {
String text = command.substring(5);

            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": "
                    + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
                    + text.substring(1) + "";
        } else if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You r muted nd u cannot yell!");
        }
    }
}[/code]

MAKE A COPY OF CLIENT.JAVA BEFORE TRYING ANY OF THESE!
